<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scout's Warning](/Feats.aspx?ID=4876) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 159 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Knight Reclaimant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=28) (Level 8)

**Trigger**
You are about to roll a Perception or Survival check for initiative

</column>

---

You visually or audibly warn your allies of danger, granting them each a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls, or a +2 circumstance bonus if you're using the Scout exploration activity. Depending on whether you use gestures or call out, this action gains either the [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=727) or the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=541) trait, respectively.
name: Scout's Warning
